# Summary

Agronomist and researcher specialized in **territorial planning**, **nature-based solutions (NBS)**, **intellectual property** and **sustainable innovation**. 10+ years bridging academic research and practical impact in Brazil's Semi-Arid region. Leader of the PLANeT-Inova group, with 98+ peer-reviewed publications and experience in multidisciplinary project coordination.

# Key Competencies

\begin{itemize}
\item \textbf{Territorial Planning \& NBS} --- Land-use management, soil/water conservation, geotextiles for erosion control
\item \textbf{Intellectual Property} --- Patent landscaping (PatentSight), technology prospecting, tech transfer
\item \textbf{Geospatial Analysis} --- QGIS, ArcGIS, Google Earth Engine, remote sensing
\item \textbf{Data \& Research} --- R, Python, SPSS, bibliometrics, systematic reviews
\item \textbf{Project Leadership} --- Grants (CNPq, FAPITEC), multidisciplinary teams, graduate supervision
\end{itemize}
